channel.title: How do i put a GFX on a regular atk?
channel.description:
liek instead of just hittin someone with DH, you hit them and zammy flames come underthem, (thats just an example)
NO i dont want it to be a spec, i want it to be a normal atk. do you know how?

item.title: How do i put a GFX on a regular atk?
item.dc:creator: @Prima Prima
item.description:
@Prima wrote:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4718) { stillgfx(78, AttackingOn2.absY, AttackingOn2.absX); }

Read full topic
